In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5207
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family's expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family's reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika's mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost, when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it, a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer's mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect 'partners', Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: Bodyguards And Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily's Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country's energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika's mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit's master, Debo.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a person's subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter's diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law's affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother's death?

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover's death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: In this Oscar nominee for Best International Feature Film, Nian faces relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her college entrance exam. Fate leads her to streetwise punk Bei, but before they can retreat into their own world, both are embroiled in a murder investigation that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpol's Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: The Calling Of A Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend's wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge - will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Hex vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiance Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls' high school, is stuck with a baby that isn't his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin's husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his Crazy Lo Han Fist improves with every fight.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General's daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiao's fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep96
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Bode Leone works alongside elite firefighters from Cal Fire and former friends, battling large-scale wildfires while navigating his complex past and personal relationships.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud S11 Ep1
programme.desc: Actress Taraji P. Henson and family compete against singer and actress Jennifer Hudson and family, and Dan Patrick and his The Dan Patrick Show family compete against Rich Eisen and his The Rich Eisen Show family, all playing for charity.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: SALT
programme.desc: Evelyn Salt (Angelina Jolie) is a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honor and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove her loyalty. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her family or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence. And with her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Witch's Return - Morihito Otogi is a teenager with ogre strength. His childhood friend, Nico, is coming home after completing her witch training! Following an old pact, they begin living together. Nico's very excited to be reunited with Morihito and her heart won't stop pounding. Along with the clumsy Nico bringing in a whirlwind of inescapable, fantastical magical troubles, can Morihito protect Nico from a dire prophecy? Nico and Morihito's magical comedy begins!

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Giant Rookie / Lets Go To A Diner / The Flying Classroom - Nico and Morihito's living situation filled with grim prospects begins, but for Morihito, an even greater challenge awaits him. That's right, Morihito and Nico both enrolled in Asunaro Private High School. They're both in the same class, but Morihito pushes Nico to hide the fact that she's a witch. But when Nico tries to sneakily use magic to save Morihito, she may have accidentally spilled all the beans!

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: Two soldiers killed in Vietnam are revived years later as cyborg super-soldiers. But when memories return, they break freesetting up a brutal showdown between former comrades.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: A beautiful, martial-arts-wielding genetic mutant defends her new race and a mysterious little boy.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Simon travels from Chile's Atacama Desert and follows the Andes mountains to Patagonia before ending up in the most southerly permanently inhabited region on earth, Tierra del Fuego.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 1 - A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The lion pride males are injured and the mothers with cubs are left vulnerable after an attack; Xudum, the female leopard, takes risks to find a mate.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 5 - The teams discover that their next destination is one of the world's oldest living cities.

programme.desc: Atlanta & Dahlonega - The New South - Griff samples Atlanta's bold energy, then heads to the Appalachians for gold rush tales.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep15
programme.desc: Visit the historic Michigan home of Alphabits cereal; the secret to a jet-black fettuccine is 3 litres of squid ink; every jar of a zesty garden mix is artfully packed by hand; and an Indiana candy factory produces more than 50 million gummy peaches per week.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep16
programme.desc: Once discontinued, the strawberry cheesecake frozen treat is back by popular demand; find out the secret to irresistible sea salt caramels; allergen-free bars pack all the satisfaction of a cinnamon bun; and a Toronto duo has put a modern twist on a Jewish culinary classic.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A flood brings new challenges for the big cats; for the first time, the lion cubs experience water and the danger it brings.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep3
programme.desc: For the final part of their trip around Sicily, Anton and Giovanni make their way to Gio's hometown of Palermo, stopping along the way to meet some beer-brewing monks.

programme.title: Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore S1 Ep2
programme.desc: How do fresh flowers from the Netherlands reach Singapore in time for Valentine's Day, or fresh cherries from New Zealand for Chinese New Year? The second episode of Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore traces the incredible journeys of time-sensitive seasonal shipments as they make their way to and through Singapore from across the world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep8
programme.desc: Night Country - Alaskans soldier through the heart of dark winter in pursuit of the resources they desperately need for survival.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Bisected by the Mekong's mighty waters, Cambodia is defined by its relationship to this great river. See why the country is a biodiversity hot spot and explore the secret refuges of animal populations that survive in its untouched natural habitats.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - The Mekong is Cambodia's lifeline, especially during the scorching dry season, when precious moisture is hard to come by. Learn how all manner of flying creatures, from birds to bats, manage resources until the rainy season brings sweet relief.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekong's journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnam's crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Vietnam: the Journey's End - The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europe's largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts' reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world's 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature's best lumberjacks, explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills, and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia - Scan the Australian skies, which regularly deliver some of the world's most volatile weather. Await cooling monsoon rains, watch lightning ignite vast wildfires, and marvel at the ingenious adaptations that help wildlife deal with these extremes.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world's 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature's best lumberjacks, explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills, and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Flight of the Pachyderms - The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they can't find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to America's far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee's Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Land of the Secret Rhino - The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of India's most iconic creatures to thrive the Greater One-horned Rhino.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to America's far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee's Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Stripes of Serima - The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevy's zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattle's grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee's Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealand's South Island. Face forest penguins' feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - Learn how winter's arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Stallions of the Himalayas - The Ladakh plateau is a land of extremes, but the Tibetan wild ass is the king of this grassland. Follow one stallion as he shadows a herd of females for his chance to sire the next generation, but in doing so, he must battle those wanting his crown!

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andalucia's Struggle - Investigate the animals that have been returned to this mosaic of extreme habitats in Spain. Then discover how small environmental changes can make big differences in the populations of many endangered species and give them a real chance to recover.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep1

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep16
programme.desc: P.u. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi's building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isn't an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Shack Attack - "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot Qilin and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sticky Business - Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil's perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Guy Time - When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Superchargers - When Ty and the gang sift through the destruction left by the Dreadtrux they discover that it changed the crater in surprising ways by unleashing a huge cache of supercharger bit bugs

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Super Scraptors - SkrapIt steals the Truxs new supply of superchargers but accidentally spills them in Scraptor Valley causing the crater to be overrun with SUPER SCRAPTORS

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby,Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rupert Builds a Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert and the Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her 'twinkle'

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that 'they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep21

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20

programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep1

While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi's violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi's music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep21

programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day , The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn't love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish , Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated it's up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop's friend Theo finally comes clean on why he's always rushing off.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep19

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko , What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian's lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S12 Ep1202
programme.desc: Search & Rescue: Pups Save the Bike Race - Adventure Bay is having a big bike race! With so many bikes on the road, it's going to be tough to keep everyone safe. Chase is on the case with his team of Safety and Rescue Pups - a crew dedicated to keeping Adventure Bay as safe as possible!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save a Roo - It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep302
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel Elevator / The Crew Builds A Popcorn-Cat Caf - Rubble & Crew steps in to help at Hotel Hadley after a snowy surprise. But when the stairs aren't fast enough, it's time to bow wow build! Caf Carl adopted kittens! But when they cause popcorn pandemonium, Rubble & Crew make the caf cat-friendly

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep216
programme.desc: The Decoder - Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Spaceland / New Rocket / Babysitting - Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre. Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him. Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Tool Duel - Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S12 Ep1202
programme.desc: Search & Rescue: Pups Save the Bike Race - Adventure Bay is having a big bike race! With so many bikes on the road, it's going to be tough to keep everyone safe. Chase is on the case with his team of Safety and Rescue Pups - a crew dedicated to keeping Adventure Bay as safe as possible!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1011
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Falling Space Junk / Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo - When Digi & Tal's space vacuum breaks it's up to the pups to save Mayor Humdinger from falling space debris. Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control. Ryder and the Pups must rescue Travis and get control of the Cuckoo to save Humdinger.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed / The Crew Builds A Super Squirrely Whirly Playground - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom - Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicua who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep5
programme.desc: I'm Hungry - King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Song of Peace - Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Turtle Boy - Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Flamenco - The Teletubbies are flamenco dancing! Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po are surprisingly good.

programme.desc: Safari So Goody - The friends are on safari and collect stars for every animal they spot. Mae-Mae wants to see them all but when things take a muddy turn, can they get their safari adventure back on track?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dog Loves Monsters - Dog and Pug visit a spooky castle, where they meet a princess who has no friends.

programme.desc: It's Time For An Easter Feast - JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep10
programme.desc: It's Time To Look For Frogs - At the wetland centre, JoJo and her friends Alfie, Raya, Jaxon and Isaiah find frog spawn. Gran Gran and Cynthia teach them about the life cycle of frog spawn to tadpole and frog.

programme.desc: Parasol Show - Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah & Duck accompany him.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: The Mystery of the Missing Billions - Where Did the Riches of East Germany's Socialist Party Disappear? Part 1 - The hunt for the assets of the former East Germanys ruling party has the hallmarks of a thriller. There are dubious characters, bags of cash, and key witnesses who suddenly die. programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Bari is a port town located at the heel of the Italian peninsula. An important hub of commerce since the time of ancient Rome, it's known for welcoming people of diverse cultures from Asia and Africa.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Laugh Then Think
programme.desc: Electrified spoons can make food taste salty, aiding people on special diets. Miyashita Homei uses this technology to recreate a variety of flavors that might reshape the future of food.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The festival on October 22 pays homage to Kyoto's 1200-year history with people parading in period costumes. Discover the citizens' resilience as they created a new Kyoto.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Pointing out a senior coworker's mistake. Kyaw Swar Aung, from Myanmar, works behind the scenes at Narita Airport. He'll tackle a roleplay challenge in which he notices a senior worker's mistake.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Okinawa is home to "Ryukyu Glass," a local industry for over 100 years. Matsumoto Sakae uses discarded bottles to make things to be loved and never again thrown away, doing his part to reduce waste.
